settings.text_description:
HEPHA brings you urban mobility with peace of mind. The Urban 8 Ultra is built to stop theft before it happens: The 2Lock front hub locks the wheel, making getaways impossible. Add a human-voice alarm that talks back – and scares off thieves.
If someone still dares: WatchMode locks the bike and marks it as unsellable. 
And on top: 100 Nm power, low-maintenance belt drive, 5-speed hub gears – all at just 21 kg.
Secure. Powerful. Clever. Pure HEPHA.

settings.subheading_1: Thanks to its advanced anti-theft protection, the Urban 8 Ultra model is extremely difficult to steal —or resell for the thief. Experience a new level of theft security with HEPHA.
settings.subheading_1_fi: Thanks to its advanced anti-theft protection, the Urban 8 Ultra model is extremely difficult to steal —or resell for the thief. Experience a new level of theft security with HEPHA.
